Class Serializable.Mat

  • java.lang.Object
    • tool.Serializable.Mat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable
    Enclosing class:
    Serializable

    public static class Serializable.Mat
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable
    Kryo Serializable Mat class. Essential fields are image data itself, rows and columns count and type of the data.

        Creates new serializable Mat given its format and data.
        Parameters:
        rows - Number of rows in the Mat object
        cols - Number of columns in the Mat object
        type - OpenCV type of the data in the Mat object
        data - Byte data containing image.
